title: Analyzing Teacher Learning Contexts and Applying Strategies for Science Education Reform

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners analyze cases of applying reform-based instructional methods from the mathematics domain to science education, and conduct reflective practice through formative assessments in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Explain core theories of science education reform (habitus, structure, agency).
Analyze three or more impacts of existing teacher learning contexts on the application of reform-based pedagogies.
Develop a self-directed learning plan for science education reform and propose two actionable strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
